name: Resume & Cover Letter template
description:
◆ The templates are focusing on contrast, spacing and repetition. I’ve revised an earlier template I did, to simplify it even further. 


◆ It’s been created in print-friendly A4 size for hiring managers with enough bleed on the edges. 


◆ I’ve placed a headshot on the resume, but I’m aware some companies these days might prefer even without it (for the good). 


◆ From experience I’ve seen people tend to replace the awards section with press or talks, and sometimes even personal stuff like hobbies or so.


◆ The template is using one font size, one typeface (Inter) and placed over an 8px grid with 7 columns. It has both a dark and a light variation.


I hope you like it ♥ and rock your next job hunt with it!
